description: This file defines API routes for analytics endpoints in a FastAPI web application. It includes functions for retrieving user analytics and listing post engagement metrics with pagination, utilizing database access functions and data models.

methods.name: get_user_analytics(user_id: int, _user=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Fetches aggregated analytics data for a specific user, including total posts, likes, comments, shares, and follower count.

methods.name: list_post_engagement( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100), _user=Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of posts with engagement metrics such as likes, comments, and shares, ordered by engagement.

ctags.name: list_post_engagement
ctags.signature: ( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=100), _user=Depends(get_current_user), )
